Package qtclient

Class QTCButtonHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • qtclient.QTCButtonHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler
    public class QTCButtonHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler
    La classe QTCButtonHandler implementa EventHandler e contiene tutti i comandi relativi ad eventi specifici.
